remarks: Membership in value of the partial isomorphism B for a lattice ` K ` . (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-2014.)
statement:
dibelval2nd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dibelval2nd.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dibelval2nd.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dibelval2nd.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibelval2nd.o $e |- .0. = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
dibelval2nd.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibelval2nd $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) /\ Y e. ( I ` X ) ) -> ( 2nd ` Y ) = .0. ) $.
$d K f $.
$d W f $.
